articles.author: Kelly Lawler, USA TODAY
articles.title: Review: 'CSI: Vegas' revival marks lackluster CBS grab for old glory - USA TODAY
articles.description: The CBS revival of 2000s megahit "CSI"  feels like a tired grab for nostalgic fans of the forensics drama.
articles.content:
The crime scenes are back. But not much has changed since 2000. 
For 15 years, the forensic scientists of "CSI: Crime Scene Investigation" often literally dug up clues to Las Vegas murders. And thei… [+3819 chars]
